_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:18:29 using v2.0
title: How has the percentage of quitters changed by quarter?
analysis_commentary: Quarterly data reveal that Quarter four of each year sees the highest rates of quitters. Quarter four corresponds to January to March, which shows that there is a higher rate of people quitting at the start of each year, suggesting that seasonal motivation is having a big impact on the proportion of quitters.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Statistics on NHS Stop Smoking Services in England
